# First Things firt, load the Tidyverse.

```{r}
library('tidyverse')
```

#### Plot 1

Load the dataset.

```{r}
data(trees)
?trees
```


Now to create the scatterplot.

```{r}
ggplot(data = trees) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = Height, y = Girth))
```

The larger the Height of the tree, the larger the girth of the tree is.
